description: The project seeks to strengthen capacities for regional councils and local authority by effectively capacitating local communities to identify aspects of their vulnerability in relation of HIV and AIDS.

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national capacity for inclusive governance and coordination of national HIV responses, and for the protection of human rights of people affected by HIV, including women and other vulnerable groups
subproject.description: The project seeks to strengthen capacities for regional councils and local authority by effectively capacitating local communities to identify aspects of their vulnerability in relation of HIV and AIDS. It further supports integration of community innovations into Regional council and Local Authorities’ planning and budgeting processes.
donor_long: ALLIANCE OF MAYORS AND MUNICIPAL ON HIV/
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Community Capacity Enhancement
